description:
Suzu dreams of Kei-o coming to rescue her from her mean master Riyo, who sends her to a dangerous cliff with a fierce monster for punishment.  Shokei cannot accept the change from the past and is jealous of Kei-o.  She gets caught singing a song from the palace, and all villagers find out her past as Princess, but she is in denial of her father’s injustice.  Kei-o, Yoko, studies under 3 personal aides, Taishi, Taifu, Taiho, and learns of politics among the Chief Officers.  Yoko is tired and accepts a dinner invitation by Taishi.  The Head of the 6 Chief Officers(Chosai), Seikyo, asks for Yoko’s decision on creating jobs for soldiers.  Since Seikyo is more familiar with the subject, Yoko leaves the decision up to him, and that makes Keiki unhappy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Great Distance in The Wind, The Sky at Dawn - Chapter 3
Kaze no Banri, Reimei no Sora - San Shou
Путь по ветру, Небо на рассвете. Часть 3
風の万里 黎明の空 三章
